dcterms:description: A harder variant of MNIST where the digit is randomly placed on a small subpatch of a colored background. Each sample also contains small distractor digits and random noise patches.
dcterms:title: Hard MNIST

dcterms:creator: Daniel Kermany
Kang Zhang
Michael Goldbaum
dcterms:description: A semi-synthetic chest x-ray dataset for pneumonia classification. The dataset includes spurious correlations injected into the images to control the information the model leverages.
dcterms:title: Chest X-ray

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: A subset of the CelebA dataset used for hair color classification with classes {dark hair, blonde hair, gray hair}. The dataset includes spurious correlations for qualitative evaluation.
dcterms:title: CelebA
